message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is worth more than $80 to me. I'm confident it could greatly benefit you as well. I'm proposing a price of $100 for the product. Please let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to make a counteroffer.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'd like to try to get a better deal. Can you meet me at $80?
